name: Case Comment
description: General case creation template for calls in Customer Solutions.

Troubleshooting.description: Steps taken and their results, leave blank for billing cases

name: Work Order
description: This template will be used when creating a work order. These notes are the only information an F.S.P. is provided, please be thorough.

Troubleshooting.description: Steps taken and results for unresolved issues

Zone.description: Can be found in the dealer site, leave blank for anything which is not a security sensor

Location.description: Location of equipment, may need to ask customer

Equipment billable.description: Vivint will cover any piece of Vivint equipment if it is not lost, stolen, or damaged. Add any variables that may occur with equipment such as color, type, etc

name: Escalating Work Order
description: Used when escalating a work order to the Scheduling department.

Best phone number to reach.description: Input and verify phone number on file

Clarification/Reasoning behind selected.description: Why does the work order need to be escalated

Best time to contact customer to confirm.description: What time is best for Scheduling to contact the Customer

name: Nesting Transfer Approval
description: Fill out this template before transferring if you are in nesting

name: Credit
description: Used in the credit description section of the credit request process

Description.description: Why the credit is being applied

Supervisor Approval.description: Name of who approved the credit, leave blank if within the credit limit for your position

name: Accounts Payable/Receivable
description: Used when corresponding with Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable. For more information on why we would reach out to these departments, refer to Accounts Receivable vs Accounts Payable.

Billing Account Number.description: Can be found in the billing details

Payment/Refund/Credit#.description: Hyperlink found on the left of the billing ledger

name: Code Red (Leadership only)
description: This template is used when submitting a Code Red to our security team through the Code Red email inbox.

Event Date and Time.description: MM/DD/YYYY 00:00 (If there is more than one event then separate each event with a comma. If the customer doesn't have a specific time of day for when the event happened, use general terms like "mid morning", "early afternoon", etc.)

name: CS Request/Invoice Request
description: This template is used when correspondence with another department is needed for specific requests. This template will be emailed to member of leadership and will be forwarded to the correct department.

E-Mail / Maililng address.description: Form of delivery preferred by the customer, including the desired location

Special Instructions.description: Requests like specific dates or information

name: IEX Update
description: Used when requesting any schedule corrections or updates. Please send these requests to your supervisor.

name: Refund
description: Used in the refund description section of the refund request process.

Description.description: Why the refund is being applied

Refund Method.description: How the customer wants to receive the refund

Supervisor Approval.description: Name of who approved the refund

name: Software Issue Ticket
description: At this point in the troubleshooting, it is necessary to submit a software issue ticket to the software issue resolution team for further review.Tickets sent without sufficient troubleshooting done or requested information will result in a coaching. Refer to Submit Software Issue Ticket if you are reporting issues with a product. You will need to include additional required details about the product.

Detailed Description of Issue.description: What is happening? How does this impact the customer? What does the customer see or experience? What should the customer see or experience? Were you able to replicate the issue?

Troubleshooting steps taken.description: Be sure to include the outcome of each step taken

Model.description: The type of device - iPhone 8, Galaxy S7, Pixel etc.

Operating System.description: iOS or Android, this should be numbers

App Version.description: This should be numbers, not "latest version"; found by selecting Support in the app menu

Model (Secondary Phone).description: The type of device - iPhone 8, Galaxy S7, Pixel etc.

Operating System (Secondary Phone).description: iOS or Android, this should be numbers

App Version (Secondary Phone).description: This should be numbers, not "latest version"; found by selecting Support in the app menu

name: Workday Update
description: Used when requesting any time clock corrections. Please send these requests to your supervisor.

name: Nesting Work Order Approval
description: Use when creating a work order in nesting

Troubleshooting done?.description: What troubleshooting have you done so far?
